llama2:70b_direct_sole-planning_results:
Day 1: March 21st, 2022 - Houston to Nashville

* Depart from Houston on a flight to Nashville (cost: $150 per person)
* Private car service from Nashville airport to hotel (cost: $30 per person)
* Check-in at Hotel A, a 4-star property with private rooms and party allowed (cost: $200 per night)

Day 2: March 22nd, 2022 - Nashville

* Take a taxi to downtown Nashville (cost: $15 per person)
* Visit the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum (cost: $25 per person)
* Lunch at a local restaurant (cost: $30 per person)
* Visit the Parthenon (cost: $10 per person)
* Dinner at a local restaurant (cost: $40 per person)
* Return to Hotel A by taxi (cost: $15 per person)

Day 3: March 23rd, 2022 - Nashville to Knoxville

* Take a private car service from Nashville to Knoxville (cost: $150 per person)
* Check-in at Hotel B, a 4-star property with private rooms and party allowed (cost: $180 per night)
* Lunch at a local restaurant (cost: $30 per person)
* Visit the World's Fair Park (cost: $20 per person)
* Dinner at a local restaurant (cost: $40 per person)

Day 4: March 24th, 2022 - Knoxville

* Take a taxi to downtown Knoxville (cost: $15 per person)
* Visit the Tennessee Theatre (cost: $20 per person)
* Lunch at a local restaurant (cost: $30 per person)
* Visit the Knoxville Zoo (cost: $30 per person)
* Dinner at a local restaurant (cost: $40 per person)
* Return to Hotel B by taxi (cost: $15 per person)

Day 5: March 25th, 2022 - Knoxville to Chattanooga

* Take a private car service from Knoxville to Chattanooga (cost: $150 per person)
* Check-in at Hotel C, a 4-star property with private rooms and party allowed (cost: $200 per night)
* Lunch at a local restaurant (cost: $30 per person)
* Visit the Tennessee Aquarium (cost: $30 per person)
* Dinner at a local restaurant (cost: $40 per person)

Day 6: March 26th, 2022 - Chattanooga

* Take a taxi to downtown Chattanooga (cost: $15 per person)
* Visit the Hunter Museum of American Art (cost: $20 per person)
* Lunch at a local restaurant (cost: $30 per person)
* Visit the Chattanooga Zoo (cost: $30 per person)
* Dinner at a local restaurant (cost: $40 per person)
* Return to Hotel C by taxi (cost: $15 per person)

Day 7: March 27th, 2022 - Chattanooga to Houston

* Take a private car service from Chattanooga to Houston (cost: $150 per person)
* Depart from Chattanooga airport on a flight back to Houston (cost: $150 per person)

Budget Breakdown:

* Flights: $300 per person (round-trip)
* Private car services: $600 per person (round-trip)
* Accommodations: $200 per night x 7 nights = $1,400 per person
* Transportation: $30 per person x 7 days = $210 per person
* Meals and activities: $30 per person x 3 meals per day x 7 days = $630 per person
* Total cost: $8,200 per person

This itinerary should fit your budget of $8,200 and provide you with a unique and enjoyable experience in Tennessee. It includes private car services for transportation, 4-star accommodations, and a variety of meals and activities.
